ygData.subject: what good is a 40 shaman?
ygData.msgSnippet: No, I am not selling this account for money. But I have a 40 shaman account (on the nameless server) and am done with it. I do not want to keep paying for it,
ygData.messageBody:
No, I am not selling this account for money.
But I have a 40 shaman account (on the nameless server) and am done
with it. I do not want to keep paying for it, as I never use it, but
I feel funny about just letting itdie. So, I'd like someone that
could use it to take it over. Now, I am looking for some sort of
compensation. NO real money, but a donation to my guild in the way of
platinum or gear would be well considered. Do not ask me how much or
what items  I don't know. If you are interested, just send an email
to me at z_elder@... saying "I would like to donate 25k to your
cause in exchange for the account" or whatever.
